OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients assign one two treatment arm : Arm I : Patients receive rituximab IV day 0 , cyclophosphamide IV , doxorubicin IV , vincristine IV day 1 , follow oral prednisone day 1-5 . Arm II : Patients receive interferon alfa subcutaneously day 22-26 , cyclophosphamide IV , doxorubicin IV , vincristine IV day 1 , follow oral prednisone day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline prior chemotherapy course . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually 10 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 40-80 patient ( 20-40 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
